Classes

class  ProSHADE_exception
 This class is the representation of ProSHADE exception. More...
 

Detailed Description

This header file contains the ProSHADE_exception class, which is used to report errors occuring during run-time.

This file declares the ProSHADE_exception class. This class is derived from runtime_error and is therefore throwable; it extends the standard exceptions class by containing a bit more information in a specific format, so that the error messages resulting from throwing this class will be a bit more informative.
